channel.title: O3 on gem5
channel.description: Recent content in O3 on gem5

item.title: Visualization
item.description: This page contains information about different types of information visualization that is integrated or can be used with gem5. O3 Pipeline Viewer The o3 pipeline viewer is a text based viewer of the out-of-order CPU pipeline. It shows when instructions are fetched (f), decoded (d), renamed (n), dispatched (p), issued (i), completed ©, and retired ®. It is very useful for understanding where the pipeline is stalling or squashing in a reasonable small sequence of code.
